statements: DELETE FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND vehicle_id = 500
DELETE FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Regular Inspection' AND date_performed < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND maintenance_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM vehicle_details WHERE manufacturer = 'BMW' OR year <= 2010;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' AND year < 2015;
DELETE FROM Inspections WHERE vehicle_id = 10 AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
